titles.title: A bill for the relief of Brenda W. Gay.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-553.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Received in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 632.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/3/1987--Introduced. Authorizes an employee of the Internal Revenue Service who is stationed in a specified district to transfer, with the approval of the director of such district, accumulated annual leave to a named Internal Revenue Service employee stationed in such district.
